effect.en: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.
effect.fr: Pendant le prochain tour de votre adversaire, le Pokémon Défenseur ne peut pas battre en retraite.
effect.es: Durante el próximo turno de tu rival, el Pokémon Defensor no puede retirarse.
effect.it: Durante il prossimo turno del tuo avversario, il Pokémon difensore non può ritirarsi.
effect.pt: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.
effect.de: Während des nächsten Zuges deines Gegners kann sich das Verteidigende Pokémon nicht zurückziehen.

effect.en: If this Pokémon has any Fire Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.
effect.fr: Si de l'Énergie Fire est attachée à ce Pokémon, cette attaque inflige 80 dégâts supplémentaires.
effect.es: Si este Pokémon tiene alguna Energía Fire unida a él, este ataque hace 80 puntos de daño más.
effect.it: Se questo Pokémon ha delle Energie Fire assegnate, questo attacco infligge 80 danni in più.
effect.pt: If this Pokémon has any Fire Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.
effect.de: Wenn an dieses Pokémon mindestens 1 Fire-Energie angelegt ist, fügt diese Attacke 80 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.

description.en: Bird Pokémon make up most of its diet. It approaches at high speeds and smacks them down to the ground with its powerful kick.
